anya-e0105n31:1_0: Aṭṭhasāliniṁ pana sammohavinodaniñca dhātukathādipañcapakaraṇassa aṭṭhakathañcāti tisso abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyo
anya-e0105n31:1_1: attanā sadisanāmena sotatthakīganthakārakena buddhaghosabhikkhunā āyācito akāsi.
anya-e0105n31:3_0: Bhikkhunā buddhaghosena, sakkaccaṁ abhiyācito’’ti dha. sa. aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n31:5_0: Ayaṁ aṭṭhasālinī nāma dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathā’’ti dha. sa. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n31:8_0: Yaṁ ārabhiṁ racayituṁ, aṭṭhakathaṁ sunipuṇesu atthesu;
anya-e0105n31:9_0: Sammohavinodanato, sammohavinodaniṁ nāmā’’ti vibha. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n31:11_0: Ayaṁ sammohavinodanī nāma vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathā’’ti vibha. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n31:12_0: Imāsu pana tīsu pañcapakaraṇaṭṭhakathāya nāmaviseso natthi āyācako ca na pakāsito,
anya-e0105n31:12_1: kevalaṁ attano saddhāya eva sañcoditena ācariyabuddhaghosena sā katā viya dissati.
anya-e0105n31:16_0: Saddhāya samāraddhā, yā aṭṭhakathā mayā tassāti ca.
anya-e0105n31:20_0: Tassa aṭṭhakathā esā, sakalassāpi niṭṭhitā’’ti paṭṭhā. aṭṭha. 19-24.1 ca.
anya-e0105n31:22_0: Ayaṁ sakalassapi abhidhammapiṭakassa aṭṭhakathā’’ti paṭṭhā. aṭṭha. 19-24.1 ca.
anya-e0105n31:23_0: Ekacce pana ādhunikā therā ‘‘abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyo ācariyabuddhaghosena yācito saṅghapālabuddhamittajotipālādīnaṁ aññataro thero akāsī’’ti vadanti.
anya-e0105n31:23_2: aṭṭhasālinīsammohavinodanīsu ‘‘tā buddhaghosena yācito akāsī’’ti ganthakārena vuttaṁ.
anya-e0105n31:25_0: Iti pana sabbaṁ yasmā, visuddhimagge mayā suparisuddhaṁ;
anya-e0105n31:26_0: Vuttaṁ tasmā bhiyyo, na taṁ idha vicārayissāmī’’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā –
anya-e0105n31:27_0: Evaṁ sīlakathādīnaṁ attanā eva visuddhimagge vuttabhāvo mayātipadena pakāsito. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ pana –
anya-e0105n31:29_0: Visuddhimagge panidaṁ, yasmā sabbaṁ pakāsita’’nti dha. sa. aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā –
anya-e0105n31:30_3: Kiñcāpi abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu abhiyācako buddhaghoso bhikkhunāti ca yatināti ca imeheva sāmaññaguṇapadehi vutto na therenāti sagāravaguṇapadena,
anya-e0105n31:30_5: ‘‘adandhagatinā subuddhinā’’ti ca imehi adhikaguṇapadehi thomitattā ‘‘visuddhimaggādikārako ācariyabuddhaghosoyevā’’ti sakkā gahetuṁ.
anya-e0105n31:30_6: So hi upasampannakālatoyeva paṭṭhāya ganthakovido pariyattivisāradaguṇasampanno,
anya-e0105n31:30_8: tasmā therenāti na vuttoti sakkā gahetunti.
anya-e0105n31:31_1: Na hi ācariyabuddhaghosatthero ‘‘tasmiṁ kāle ūnadasavasso’’ti sakkā gahetuṁ,
anya-e0105n31:31_5: ‘‘adandhagatinā subuddhinā’’ti vā ettakeheva dvīhi dvīhi guṇapadehi thomanena suthomito hoti,
anya-e0105n31:31_6: aññadatthu ‘‘nippabhīkatakhajjoto samudeti divākaro’’ti thomanaṁ viya hoti.
anya-e0105n31:33_1: soyeva ca porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo saṅkhipitvā abhinavasaṅgahaṭṭhakathānaṁ ādikattā pubbaṅgamo,
anya-e0105n31:33_2: aññe pana abhinavaṭṭhakathākārā tasseva anuvattitvā avasesamekaṁ vā dve vā aṭṭhakathāyo akaṁsu.
anya-e0105n31:33_3: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu ca yo yo attho visuddhimagge vutto,
anya-e0105n31:33_4: so so yathānuppattaṭṭhāne tato gahetvā tatheva vutto.
anya-e0105n31:33_5: Visesato pana paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgakhandhāyatanadhātusaccavibhaṅgavaṇṇanāsu jhānakathāvaṇṇanāsu ca ayamattho ativiya pākaṭo,
anya-e0105n31:33_6: yopi ca tattha appako katipayamatto visuddhimaggena visadiso saṁvaṇṇanābhedo dissati,
anya-e0105n31:33_7: sopi ābhidhammikānaṁ matānusārena yathā porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṁ vutto,
anya-e0105n31:33_9: Yathā ca aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya atideso dissati dha. sa. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n31:33_11: tatheva samantapāsādikāyampi aṭṭhasāliniyā atideso dissateva pārā. aṭṭha. 1.11;.
anya-e0105n31:33_12: Yadi ca aṭṭhasālinī aññena katā bhaveyya,
anya-e0105n31:33_14: Tasmā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu abhiyācako buddhaghoso ācariyena samānanāmo cūḷabuddhaghosoti yāvajjatanā
anya-e0105n31:34_0: Yadi pana ettakena niṭṭhaṁ na gaccheyya,
anya-e0105n31:34_2: kinnu kho saṅghapālādayo therā visuddhimaggādīnaṁ karaṇatthāya ācariyabuddhaghosattheraṁ āyācamānā attanā
anya-e0105n31:34_5: Tathā ca sati ācariyabuddhaghosatthero sayaṁ aññehi samatthatarova samāno kasmā aññaṁ āyāceyya.
anya-e0105n31:34_6: Na hi saddhāsampannassa thāmasampannassa yobbanasampannassa ācariyassa sundarataraṁ abhidhammaṭṭhakathaṁ kātuṁ bhāriyaṁ bhavissati.
anya-e0105n31:34_7: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsu ca vuttavacanāni visuddhimaggaāgamaṭṭhakathāsu vuttasaṁvaṇṇanāvacanehi ekākārāneva honti.
anya-e0105n31:34_9: kathamapi tāhi vacanākārassa visadisatā bhaveyya eva.
anya-e0105n31:34_10: Etāsaṁ nigamane ca dassitena ‘‘buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā’’ti vacanena ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghosena katā’’tveva pākaṭā honti,
anya-e0105n31:34_13: tepi ‘‘iminā nāma therenā’’ti ekaṁsato dassetuṁ na sakkonti,
anya-e0105n31:34_14: tathā dassetuñca lesamattampi sādhakavacanaṁ na dissati.
anya-e0105n31:34_15: Tasmā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyopi idāni ācariyehi cūḷabuddhaghosoti voharitena buddhaghosena nāma bhikkhunāyācito
anya-e0105n31:34_16: visuddhimaggavinayāgamaṭṭhakathānaṁ kārako ācariyamahābuddhaghosattheroyeva akāsīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti.
anya-e0105n31:35_0: Yaṁ pana mahāvaṁse ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghoso sīhaḷadīpāgamanato pubbe jambudīpe vasanakāleyeva aṭṭhasāliniṁ akāsī’’ti adhippāyena –
anya-e0105n31:37_1: taṁ idāni dissamānāya aṭṭhasāliniyā na sameti.
anya-e0105n31:37_2: Tattha hi ganthārambheyeva visuddhimaggaṁ atidisitvā pacchāpi so ca,
anya-e0105n31:37_4: Tasmā tassā ācariyena sīhaḷadīpaṁ patvā visuddhimaggañceva samantapāsādikañca katvā pacchāyeva katabhāvo ativiya pākaṭoti.
